Description: This is a 2009 Gibson Flying V, serial number 006291352, in exceptionally fine condition. It is the Gibson model 'Tribal V', and is numbered 182 of only 350 made. This guitar features black tribal graphics on a white body. The guitar is fully original and it is just the way it left the Gibson factory 10 years ago. There is very little playing wear. This rare 'V' also features a Kahler tremolo vibrato, and black hardware. The guitar has a straight neck, and plays as smooth as butter. It's original Gibson hardshell case includes lots of case candy: Owners manual, Warranty card, Certificate of Authenticity (last picture), and a pack of 'tribal' guitar picks, as seen in the next to last picture. The guitar weighs just 7 pounds, 8.8 ounces, and is very striking looking on stage. We offer a 48-hour approval period with a full money back guarantee, except shipping costs, so buy with confidence. Choose 'Buy It Now' price of $1,175 and we'll pay all shipping and insurance in the continental U.S. Moreover, we pay half the mailing costs to foreign buyers if they choose 'Buy It Now'. Otherwise, UPS domestic shipping would be $99 (shipping out to the West Coast costs $109), and overseas shipping (via priority insured mail) will be about $169. NOTE: Australian buyers must pay $595 shipping because we have to ship via Fed-Ex. The post office's priority mail package service will not handle a full size guitar box, and we can't unbolt the neck as with a Fender, to reduce the dimensional requirements.
Title: 2009 GIBSON FLYING V, TRIBAL 'V', LIMITED EDITION #182 OF 350, EXCELLENT COND.
ConditionDescription: BLACK TRIBAL GRAPHICS, FULLY ORIGINAL JUST AS IT LEFT THE GIBSON FACTORY 10-YEARS AGO, HARDSHELL CASE.
